revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Huawei |model=HG658 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/20/2012 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router,dsl modem,analog phone gateway |fcc_id=QISHG658 |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM63168;BCM63168VKFEBG; |cpu1_cspeed=400 |cpu1_cores=2 |fla1=64 |fla1_brand=STMicroelectronics |fla1_model=NAND512W3A2SN6 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5PS5162GFR-S6C |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM63168;BCM63168VKFEBG; |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |addl_chips= |flags=ADSL2+,VDSL |stock_boot= |stock_os= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=vodafone/admin |default_pass=vodafone/admin1234 |oui=F8:3D:FF |oui_eth=F8:3D:FF }} {{TagLine|Wireless ADSL2+ Home Gateway}} :[https://www.manualslib.com/manual/676149/Huawei-Hg658.html?page=2#manual User Guide] {{â€¢}} [https://zh.scribd.com/mobile/doc/149978457/HG658-Home-Gateway-User-Guide-English User Manual]
"HG658BZV VER. A" is silkscreened on the main board in the FCC photos. :"HG658ANT0 VER. A" is silkscreened on an antenna. Per the FCC photos, this device is using BCM63168VKFEBG.
The FCC sample label shows the device with a SSID of '''HG658-XXXXXX'''. :The default IP and credentials are from the FCC ''manual''.
The label in the FCC internal photos shows the device with a default SSID :of '''Clicknet-DAEA''' ('''Clicknet-XXXX'''), a [[wikipedia:Romtelecom|'''Romtelecom''']] logo, :and a MAC of F8:3D:FF:12:DA:EA ('''Huawei''' OUI). There are currently 62 entries for '''Clicknet-XXXX''' in WiGLE with a F8:3D:FF OUI.
